name: Pass The Torch (Andrew_Ashbaugh)
description:
Lost in the woods, this is a game about a father and son trying to find their way back home. 

Controls:

Move: WASD

Switch characters: Space

Aim: Mouse

Shoot: LMB

Interact: E

External Assets Used:

Some sounds from freesound.org

Font is brown paper bag from 1001 fonts 

Credits:

Programming - Andrew Ashbaugh

3D Art - Lauren Sharpe

2D Art - Ahmed Kamal

Download Instuctions:

Download. Extract. Play.
